heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Food and Feed
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Food and Feed 

Hygiene) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (food feed hygiene) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: No. 22 of 2020) are amended in Regulation 3, by substituting for the definition
heading: 2. The European Union (Food and Feed Hygiene) Regulations 2020 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Food and Feed Hygiene) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 22 of 2020) are amended in Regulation 3, by substituting for the definition 
of “Regulation No 852/2004” the following- 

“’Regulation No 852/2004’ means Regulation (EC) No 852/2004 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 29 April 20042 as amended 
by Commission Regulation (EC) No 1019/2008 of 17 October 20083, 
Regulation (EC) No 219/2009 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 11 March 20094 and Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/382 
of 3 March 2021;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 74, 4.3.2021, p.3 
2 OJ L 139, 30.4.2004, p.1 
3 OJ L 277, 18.10.2008, p.7 
4 OJ L 87, 31.3.2009, p.109 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [744] 3

title: No. 22 of 2020) are amended in Regulation 3, by substituting for the definition
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend European Union (Food and Feed Hygiene) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 22 of 2020) to give effect to give effect to 
Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/382 of 3 March 2021 insofar as it amends 
Annex II to Regulation (EC) No. 852/2004 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council on the hygiene of foodstuffs as regards food allergen management, 
redistribution of food and food safety culture. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Hygiene of 
Foodstuffs) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [744]
